list.name: Changes
list.comment: Set global style to "Fusion" Improved the advanced settings area of the edit widget

list.name: Changes
list.comment: Refined the color themes. Changed the process for setting a song order to a more use-friendly system utilizing drag-and-drop between QListWidgets.
list.component:
{ "keyToString": { "ASKED_ADD_EXTERNAL_FILES": "true", "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "DefaultHtmlFileTemplate": "HTML File", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "master", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/pasto/Desktop/project_on", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "com.jetbrains.python.configuration.PyActiveSdkModuleConfigurable" { "keyToString": { "ASKED_ADD_EXTERNAL_FILES": "true", "ASKED_SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "DefaultHtmlFileTemplate": "HTML File", "RunOnceActivity.OpenProjectViewOnStart": "true", "RunOnceActivity.ShowReadmeOnStart": "true", "SHARE_PROJECT_CONFIGURATION_FILES": "true", "git-widget-placeholder": "development", "ignore.virus.scanning.warn.message": "true", "last_opened_file_path": "C:/Users/pasto/Desktop/project_on", "settings.editor.selected.configurable": "com.jetbrains.python.configuration.PyActiveSdkModuleConfigurable" <servers /> </component> <component name="Vcs.Log.Tabs.Properties"> <option name="TAB_STATES"> <map> <entry key="MAIN"> <value> <State /> </value> </entry> </map> </option> </component> <component name="VcsManagerConfiguration"> <option name="CHECK_NEW_TODO" value="false" /> <option name="ADD_EXTERNAL_FILES_SILENTLY" value="true" /> <MESSAGE value="Initial Commit" /> <MESSAGE value="Added more import and an export option(s)
Consolodated many custom widget implementations into one file
Created a standardized saving/waiting splash" /> <MESSAGE value="Added an additional settings file to be saved in the user's %appdir% to save device-specific settings; namely, last used directory and used service files, since these may be in different locations depending on the device." /> <MESSAGE value="Forgot to include parse_scripture_reference.py" /> <MESSAGE value="Added some default files to be copied on a first run or if any of the items in the data folder are deleted." /> <MESSAGE value="Changed background music of the test video" /> <MESSAGE value="Correct wrong url in sample web slide" /> <MESSAGE value="Fixed no newline when logging unhandled exception.
Fixed unindexed passages variable when checking for -1 return value." /> <MESSAGE value="Added ability to print the order of service" /> <MESSAGE value="Added documentation to parse_scripture_reference.py" /> <MESSAGE value="Added keyboard shortcuts to various menu items and added a menu bar tab to the help window" /> <MESSAGE value="Added a font settings popup to the toolbar and adjusted the font saving procedures to accommodate.

Changed the way scripture passages are retrieved and parsed so that verses with numbers in them (that aren't the verse numbers themselves) aren't interpreted as separate verses." /> <MESSAGE value="Fixed toolbar loading order problem" /> <MESSAGE value="Ensured that default bible is set in settings if any bibles exist in the data folder and that key doesn't exist in settings.

Improved scripture parsing into slides so that the last verse isn't automatically put on to a new slide, but only if it being added overflows the lyric widget." /> <MESSAGE value="Fixed Access Violation crash when re-playing a video

Added light and dark themes - probably need some more refinement" /> <MESSAGE value="Made improvements to light and dark themes
Made improvements to the font widget
Ensured that changes made in the font widget when it's in the edit widget doesn't change the global font settings
Added extra font settings columns to the database's song and custom tables" /> <MESSAGE value="Made improvements to light and dark themes
Created a standardized QListItemWidget for all QListWidget items
Fixed some bugs in the font widget
Improved the layout of the web remote and mobile web remote
Decreased iteration count for parsing scripture to one more than verses" /> <MESSAGE value="Stored the 'status_update_count' in the device-specific settings file instead of the main settings file.
Added "File Locations" tab to the help window." /> <MESSAGE value="Refined the color themes.
Changed the process for setting a song order to a more use-friendly system utilizing drag-and-drop between QListWidgets." /> <option name="LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE" value="Refined the color themes.
Changed the process for setting a song order to a more use-friendly system utilizing drag-and-drop between QListWidgets." /> </component> <component name="XDebuggerManager"> <breakpoint-manager> <default-breakpoints> <breakpoint type="python-exception"> <properties notifyOnTerminate="true" exception="BaseException"> <option name="notifyOnTerminate" value="true" /> </properties> </breakpoint> </default-breakpoints> </breakpoint-manager> </component> </project>
